æ›´æ–°æ—¥å¿—ï¼ˆè‹±æ–‡ï¼‰ï¼š
0.1.1Â  Â Â Â Initial release: 6 origins (Avian, Arachnid, Feline, Merling, Blazeborn, Phantom)0.1.2Â  Â Â Â + Added Water Protection enchantment which delays the onset of damage taken in water by Blazeborn. It's a treasure enchantment found in dungeons, mineshafts, stronghold libraries and small underwater ruins.Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  * Fixed a startup crash when BetterNether is used alongside this mod0.1.3Â  Â Â Â * Fixed a bug where attribute modifiers (such as from Fragile or Nine Lives power) would be applied again on the client-side when using a Nether portal0.1.4Â  Â Â Â + Merlings now no longer lose their breath when standing in rain (but don't regain it either!)
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  * Fixed bugs with the Nether Spawn power
* Fixed Phantoms sometimes catching fire while in rain0.0.1(é€‚ç”¨äº1.15.2)Unsupported Forge version for Minecraft 1.15.2. Please don't ask for updates, the mod will continue to be developed only for Fabric.
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â Note: This version has different Origins from the other version, and those that are the same might also have differences between the versions. Some Origins have undergone very little testing and might break. Use this version at your own risk.0.2.0Â  Â Â Â Origins are now data-driven! Add or remove (existing) powers to your favorite origin, make certain origins unchoosable on your server, or add new origins with a mix of the existing powers! Refer to the wiki for more information. (Data-driven powers are planned, but it will take a bit more time before they're ready!)
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â 
Also featuring two new origins: Elytrian and Enderian!

And a number of small bug fixes and improvements:
+ Added a new GUI to view your current origin, by default accessed by pressing O* Fixed a bug with the rendering of resource/cooldown bars* Prevented players from maliciously picking unchoosable origins* Fixed Orb of Origin being consumed when used in Creative mode* Fixed Merlings not getting full break speed when half in water and not sneaking
0.2.1Â  Â Â Â Fixed a bug which would prevent the game from loading. Oops, sorry for that!0.2.2Â  Â Â Â + Added translation for Simplified Chinese, credits go to æ’¸æ„æ€
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  * Fixed a bug where their Origin would not get synced to clients when they first join a server after restarting their client, which caused some powers to not work and other weird behaviour
* Fixed a bug where Elytrians would receive the Claustrophobia debuff when in boats
* Fixed a bug where Elytrian's Claustrophobia debuff would not wear off correctly, which caused it to reappear much quicker0.2.3Â  Â Â Â + Added Russian translation (credits go to JustMarkov)
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  * Fixed a crash that occured when spectating a non-player entity0.2.4Â  Â Â Â + Added French translation (credits to VikoRifeo and PhantomShinigami)Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â + Added German translation (credits to Anonymous)
+ Added a command to set the origin of one or more players: /origin set <target(s)> <origin>
* Fixed bugs with choosing from and to Blazeborn with the Orb of Origin, these might not apply if you played as Blazeborn prior to this release
* Fixed Webbing power of Arachnids also applying on ranged attacks despite the description stating otherwise0.2.5Â  Â  + Added the ability to restore 3 air bubbles as a Merling, by drinking water (or any potion).Â  Â  * Slightly lowered the position of cooldown bars in the HUD.Â  Â  * Fixed a bug where cooldown bars would render overlaid on top of mount health when a mount had more than 10 hearts of life.Â  Â  * Fixed PreventItemUsePower not working on all items.Â  Â  * Fixed the origin command throwing an error in the server console and not providing suggestions for origins when used by a client on a dedicated server.Â  Â  * Fixed the origin command using a wrong translation key and applying the "empty" origin when the provided origin could not be found. Now shows the error message correctly and doesn't change the origin of the tar0.2.6
+ Added Shulk origin+ Gave Enderians an Ender Particle effect for other players to see+ Added Italian translation
* Made Merling's water vision togglable.* Made "meat" consider FoodComponent#isMeat, theoretically allowing for automatic mod compatibility of Carnivore and Vegeterian powers.
0.2.7Â  Â Â Â * Fixed a crash when joining a world where you played as Merling on an older version of Origins0.3.1Â  Â Â Â * Conduits now allow Merlings in range to breathe on landÂ  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â + Data packs can now add additional layers
+ Data packs can now add upgrades for origins

(See the wiki for more information on the data pack additions)

This update contains quite a few behind the scene changes, which requires data pack authors to update their pack with an additional layer file. See the wiki page linked above and follow the steps for "adding the new origin to the default origin layer" if you added a new origin with a data pack.
This change will also need to be done by add-on authors, which means that the add-ons will have to update specifically to support this version. Until then, their new origins won't be shown in the choose origin menu. But because this version alone does not offer a lot of new content, you can decide to wait with the update until the add-ons are compatible if you are playing with those. Sorry for the inconveniences.0.3.2Â  Â Â Â + Phantoms now have translucent skin.
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â + Added spanish translation (credits to Tild09)0.3.3Â  Â Â Â * Fixes a bug of 0.3.2 which caused the game to crash... Sorry.0.3.4ï¼ˆ1.16.2ï¼‰Â  Â Â Â + Actually made Merlings on land be affected by conduitsÂ  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â * Fixed a bug where the outer layer of the skin of Phantoms would not render translucent on the hand in first person0.3.5Â  Â Â Â + Added data-based translations for origins and layers, so that you can define new origins and layers without adding resource packs.0.3.6Â  Â Â Â + Players are now invulnerable while choosing an origin
* Prevented Nether Spawn power from picking invalid spawn locations
* Fixed bug where players who chose a Nether spawning origin would not be able to choose origins of additional layers0.3.7
Fixed bubble particles appearing at the feet when drowning as a MerlingFixed found water protection books not being usableUpdated Simplified Chinese translation (thanks Neubulae!)Added Brazilian Portuguese translation (thanks GeeLeonidas!)
0.3.8* Updated to 1.16.3, though no changes. This means that this version is also compatible with 1.16.2.+ Added visual overlay when phantomized, strength configurable+ Added configuration for phantomized overlay and cooldown bar position+ Added integration with Mod Menu, so that config can be changed in-game+ Added two advancement criteria, one for origins and one for powers* Now relies on FallFlyingLib for elytra power, so that it's compatible with other mods, e.g. Elytra Hopping
